emergencyDrugs.name: Adenosine
emergencyDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight) => weight < 60 ? `${weight * 100} micrograms (initial), ${weight * 250} micrograms (full)` : weight < 96 ? `6000 micrograms (initial, max dose), ${weight * 250} micrograms (full)` : '6000 micrograms (initial, max dose), 24000 micrograms (full, max dose)'
emergencyDrugs.calculatedVolume: (weight) => weight < 60 ? `${weight * 100 / 3000} ml (initial), ${weight * 250 / 3000} ml (full)` : weight < 96 ? `2 ml (initial), ${weight * 250 / 3000} ml (full)` : `2 ml (initial), 8 ml (full)`
emergencyDrugs.description:
Adenosine

100 micrograms/kg (initial dose) up to 250 micrograms/kg

Maximum initial dose 6 mg, maximum full dose 24 mg

emergencyDrugs.name: Amiodarone
emergencyDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight) => weight < 60 ? `${weight * 5} mg over 3 mins, only in arrest` : '300 mg over 3 mins, only in arrest (max dose)'
emergencyDrugs.description:
Amiodarone

5 mg/kg over 3 mins, only in arrest

Maximum dose 300 mg

emergencyDrugs.name: Atropine
emergencyDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight) => weight < 5 ? '100 micrograms (min dose)' : weight > 30 ? '600 micrograms (max dose)' : `${weight * 20} micrograms`

intubationDrugs.name: Atropine
intubationDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight) => weight < 5 ? '100 micrograms (min dose)' : weight > 30 ? '600 micrograms (max dose)' : `${weight * 20} micrograms`

bolusDrugs.name: Aciclovir
bolusDrugs.dose: (weight) => '20 mg/kg if <60 days old, 500 * surface area (m²) if <12 years old, otherwise 5 mg/kg'
bolusDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight, patientAgeInDays, surfaceArea) => patientAgeInDays < 60 ? `${weight * 20} mg` : patientAgeInDays < 4380 ? `${500 * surfaceArea} mg` : `${weight * 5} mg`

bolusDrugs.name: Magnesium Sulphate 50%
bolusDrugs.dose: (weight) => '0.08 ml/kg - dilute x10, slow IV over 20 mins'

bolusDrugs.name: Hypertonic Saline
bolusDrugs.calculatedDose: (weight) => weight < 50 ? `${weight * 5} ml of 3% or ${weight * 3} ml of 5%` : '250 ml of 3% (max dose) or 150 ml of 5% (max dose)'

sedationInfusions.name: Morphine
sedationInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 50 ? '1 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (1 mg/ml)'
sedationInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 50 ? `${weight} mg in 50 ml` : `50 mg in 50 ml`
sedationInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 50 ? `1 ml/hr (20 micrograms/kg/hr)` : `1 ml/hr (${1000 / weight} micrograms/kg/hr)`

sedationInfusions.name: Midazolam
sedationInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 50 ? '5 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (5 mg/ml)'
sedationInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 50 ? `${weight * 5} mg in 50 ml` : `250 mg in 50 ml`
sedationInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 50 ? `1 ml/hr (100 micrograms/kg/hr)` : `1 ml/hr (${5000 / weight} micrograms/kg/hr)`

sedationInfusions.name: Rocuronium
sedationInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 16.6 ? '30 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (10 mg/ml)'
sedationInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 16.6 ? `${weight * 30} mg in 50 ml` : `500 mg in 50 ml`
sedationInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 16.6 ? `1 ml/hr (600 micrograms/kg/hr)` : `1 ml/hr (${10000 / weight} micrograms/kg/hr)`

sedationInfusions.name: Atracurium
sedationInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 33 ? '15 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (10 mg/ml)'
sedationInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 33 ? `${weight * 15} mg in 50 ml` : `500 mg in 50 ml`
sedationInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 33 ? `1 ml/hr (300 micrograms/kg/hr)` : `1 ml/hr (${10000 / weight} micrograms/kg/hr)`

cardiacInfusions.name: Central DOPamine
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? '15 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : '3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? `${weight * 15} mg in 50 ml` : `${weight * 3} mg in 50 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: DOBUTamine
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? '15 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : '3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? `${weight * 15} mg in 50 ml` : `${weight * 3} mg in 50 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: Peripheral Adrenaline
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? '0.03 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : '0.006 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? `${weight * 0.03} mg in 50 ml` : `${weight * 0.006} mg in 50 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: Central Adrenaline
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? '0.3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : '0.06 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? `${weight * 0.3} mg in 50 ml` : `${weight * 0.06} mg in 50 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: Metaraminol
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => { if (weight < 10) { return '0.3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with NaCl 0.9%'; } else if (weight < 66.6) { return '0.15 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with NaCl 0.9%'; } else { return '10 mg made up to 50 ml with NaCl 0.9%'; } }
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => { if (weight < 10) { return `${weight * 0.3} mg in 50 ml`; } else if (weight < 66.6) { return `${weight * 0.15} mg in 50 ml`; } else { return '10 mg in 50 ml'; } }
cardiacInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 10 ? `2.5 ml/hr (0.25 micrograms/kg/min)` : weight < 66.6 ? `5 ml/hr (0.25 micrograms/kg/min)` : `${0.075 * weight} ml/hr (0.25 micrograms/kg/min)`

cardiacInfusions.name: Noradrenaline
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? '0.3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : '0.06 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 40 ? `${weight * 0.3} mg in 50 ml` : `${weight * 0.06} mg in 50 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: Vasopressin
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 16.6 ? `${(weight * 2.4)} units made up to 40 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%` : `40 units made up to 40 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%`
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 16.6 ? `${(weight * 2.4)} units in 40 ml` : `40 units in 40 ml`

cardiacInfusions.name: Milrinone
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 33.3 ? '1.5 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (1 mg/ml)'
cardiacInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 33.3 ? `${(weight * 1.5)} mg in 50 ml` : `50 mg in 50 ml`
cardiacInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight < 33.3 ? `1 ml/hr (0.5 micrograms/kg/min)` : `1 ml/hr (${50000 / (3000 * weight)} micrograms/kg/min)`

cardiacInfusions.name: Dinoprostone (PGE2)
cardiacInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 10 ? '100 micrograms made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or Glucose 10%' : 'N/A'

otherInfusions.name: Peripheral Salbutamol
otherInfusions.standardRegime: () => '10 mg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'

otherInfusions.name: Peripheral Aminophylline
otherInfusions.standardRegime: () => '500 mg made up to 500 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'

otherInfusions.name: Peripheral Tranexamic Acid
otherInfusions.standardRegime: () => '500 mg made up to 500 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%'
otherInfusions.startingRate: (weight) => weight > 62.5 ? 'Run at 125 ml/hr (max dose) for 8hr (or until bleeding stops)' : `Run at ${weight * 2} ml/hr (2 mg/kg/hr) for 8hr (or until bleeding stops)`

otherInfusions.name: Central Salbutamol
otherInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 16 ? '3 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (1 mg/ml)'
otherInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 16 ? `${(weight * 3)} mg in 50 ml` : '50 mg in 50 ml'

otherInfusions.name: Central Aminophylline
otherInfusions.standardRegime: (weight) => weight < 25 ? '50 mg/kg made up to 50 ml with Glucose 5% or NaCl 0.9%' : 'Neat (25 mg/ml)'
otherInfusions.calculatedRegime: (weight) => weight < 25 ? `${(weight * 50)} mg in 50 ml` : '1250 mg in 50 ml'
